subject.normal: [osg-users] a question about blender and osgExport

headers.subject: Re: [osg-users] a question about blender and osgExport

body.para: when you say "version of osgExport is the lastest version", can you at least point to where did you downloaded it? Also, as Cedric asked before, which version of *osg-data* (which holds nathan.osg) are you using?

quote.quotepara: help me please! i have try this almost a week, but still have proplems
